name: Jungle Dash (BucketGames)
description:
In Jungle Dash you are a rolling spider that jumps, dashes and swings through the jungle!  But beware of the spreading jungle fire!

Instruction: 

Download the zip-file

Rightclick and press extract here or any other place on the computer where you might want the file

Then you just open the folder and open the exe file titled "Jungle Dash"

If the tutorial deosn't work properly try re-installing the game.

Keep in mind that the game is currently in early alpha. Gameplay feel, textures and stages will be modified. 

If you get any buggs or have any opinions on how to improve the game feel free to write a comment!
